name: Dragon Stone
description:
in the game you play as a kid heading out to college with your 3 freinds along the way though you find a town the towns people are furious seeking revenge on the dragon who burned the town down taking everything they had and most importantly taking the sun stone a item that brings light and joy to the world but with it in the dragons hands the energy from the stone has been lost and now strange creatures have been appearing to take over the world 

also the games price is based on how much i think its worth for the amount of time it took to make seriously i spent like 200 hours on it i also made most of the OST available to listen to on yt   anyway have a good day!
